code: @Manual{,   title = {rxy: Calculate and Plot Correlations In Data Frames},   author = {Nathan Hausspiegel},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.1.0}, }

what: Calculate and Plot Correlations In Data Frames
title: Calculate and Plot Correlations In Data Frames
text: R package analyzing correlations variables data frames printing, summarizing, plotting nicely. Created Nathan Hausspiegel (nhausspiegel@wesleyan.edu) QAC356 Wesleyan University.

title: Plot a ryx object — plot.ryx
text: plot arranged absolute value variable's correlation.

title: Print a ryx object — print.ryx
text: Prints ryx object nicely formatted informative manner.

what: Calculate correlations in a data frame — ryx
title: Calculate correlations in a data frame — ryx
text: Calculates correlations one variable (y) others (x) data frame.

title: Calculate correlations in a data frame — ryx
Calculate correlations in a data frame — ryx
text: data data frame. y name one variables data. x character vector: names variables data. missing, numeric variables data y used.

title: Calculate correlations in a data frame — ryx
text: list including y, x, data frame results, includes correlation values, p-values, significance values variable x tested y.

title: Calculate correlations in a data frame — ryx
Summarize a ryx object — summary.ryx
text: Summarizes ryx object, providing statistical info correlations.

title: Summarize a ryx object — summary.ryx
code: library(MASS) summary(ryx(Boston, y="medv")) #> Correlating medv with crim zn indus nox rm age dis tax ptratio black lstat #> The median absolute correlation was 0.427 with a range from -0.738 to 0.695 #>  11 out of 11 variables were significant at the p < 0.05 level.
